participant_1.background:
I have a soft spot for my parents and sweets.
i love watching sitcoms on television.
i like to play soccer , draw and read asterix.
My favorite websites are those that help me with my addiction recovery and those that offer suspense novels.
No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes.

participant_2.background:
I'm interested in learning more about how to cope with my wife's terminal cancer.
I sometimes spend hours practicing bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it.
I love spending time with my dog on Christmas.
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
i vacation in florida every winter.

content.text: Hi there! What are you up to today?
Hello! I'm just hanging out, trying to relax before the work week starts.
I'm glad to hear that! What kind of work do you do?
I'm a therapist, and I work with people who are struggling with addiction.
That must be very rewarding work.
It is, but it can also be very challenging.
I can imagine. What are some of your favorite things to do outside of work?
I love spending time with my family and friends, and I also enjoy reading and watching movies.
Sounds like you have a lot of interests! I like reading and watching movies as well.
What are some of your favorite movies?
I love a lot of different types of movies, but some of my favorites include The Shawshank Redemption, The Godfather, and The Princess Bride.
Those are all great movies! I love The Shawshank Redemption and The Princess Bride.
I'm glad to hear that! Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going to the movies or taking a walk in the park.
